title: Rudolph Von Ballmoos Passes On
text:
19:15 CET Rudolph Von Ballmoos Passes On By Daily Guide 
Rudolf Von Ballmoos Rudolf Von Ballmoos, Founder of Provident Insurance Company Limited, has passed away, according to reports. 
Mr Von Ballmoos, who retired in December 2008, had been the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the company since its inception in October 1982. 
Mr. Von Ballmoos had over 40 years of rich insurance background and work experience and spent most of those years in key management positions. 
He had B.Sc in Economics with specialty in Insurance from the University of Pennsylvania, USA. 
His insurance work experience included time spent at Crusader Insurance Company (Ghana), Providence Insurance Company (Liberia) and State Insurance Company of Ghana. 
Mr. Von Ballmoos served on many corporate boards, including Consolidated Discount House, Consolidated Asset Management Company. 
He contributed immensely to the development of the insurance industry in Ghana. 
The Provident Insurance Company (PIC) is a private limited liability company incorporated and was registered in Ghana in February, 1981. 
It commenced business in October 1982 and has branches in Tema, Kumasi, Takoradi, Obuasi and Cape Coast.
